document_data.name: Kestrel Vaylan
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Kestrel Vaylan''' was the widow of [[Olaf Vaylan]].
document_data.History: Around [[1371 DR]], she asked adventurers to aid [[Cormyr]] after [[goblin]] raids sent by [[Nalavarauthatoryl|Nalavara]].
